definitions.title: n.pr.loc.
definitions.body: po/l(e)iv Iareim[n], Kariaqiareim, etc. (city of forests);—city of the Gibeonites Jos 9:17, assigned to Judah Jos 15:60 cf. Ju Jdg 18:12, Jdg 18:12, on border of Benj. Jos 15:9 ([[יְעָרִים הַר]] v:Jos 15:10, LXX po/lin Iarein, v. [[יְעָרִים]]), Jos 18:14, assigned to Benj. v:Jos 15:28 ([[יְעָרִים]] om. by text. err. before [[עָרִים]], v. LXX); near Beth Shemesh 1Sa 6:21, long the abode of ark 1Sa 7:1, 1Sa 7:2, 1Ch 13:5, 1Ch 13:6, 2Ch 1:4; named in genealogical list 1Ch 2:50, 1Ch 2:52, 1Ch 2:53; named also Ne 7:29 = [[עָרִים]] ´[[ק]]: Ezr 2:25 (read [[יְעָרִים]]); c. art. [[הַיְּעָרִים]] ´[[ק]]: Je 26:20; abbreviated (in poet.) ([[שְׂדֵי־]]) [[יׇ֑עַר]] Ps 132:6; called also [[קִרְיַת־בַּעַל]] (Kariaqbaal) Jos 15:60, Jos 18:14 + v:Jos 15:15 (where read for [[יְעָרִים]] ´[[ק]]:, so LXX Di Benn Steuern); this abbrev. into [[בַּעֲלָה]], Jos 15:9, Jos 15:10 [(Ie)baal], also v:Jos 15:11, v:Jos 15:29, and [[מִבַּעֲלֵי יְהוּדָה]] 2Sa 6:2 (rd. ´[[בַּעַל יְה]]:, or ´[[בַּעֲלַת יְה]]:), ‖[[בַּעֲלָָתָה]] 1Ch 13:6 (v. on these II. [[בַּעֲלָה]]). Identif. uncertain; Rob:BR ii. 11 conj. Kiryat el-‘Enab, 8 m. + W. of Jerusalem (cf. Kariaqiareim Lag:Onom. 271); ‘Erma (Henderson:Pal. 85, 112, 210 Conder:Survey Mem. iii. 43 ff.), cf. GASm:Geogr. 225 f. Buhl:Geogr. 166 f..
